duck: A powerful Etruscan town, it later was a free commune and passed to Florence in the 14th cent.

}} 'Volterra', known to the ancient Etruscans as Velathri, to the Romans as
Volaterrae, is a town and [[comune]] in the Tuscany region of Italy.
